hero.title: Building the Web3 Virtual Goods Ecosystem
hero.subtitle: Sapphire Mall is committed to building the world's leading Web3 virtual goods trading platform, providing users with secure, efficient, and profitable trading experiences through innovative liquidity staking mechanisms, DAO governance, and diversified asset support.

coreValues.title: Core Values
coreValues.subtitle: We are committed to redefining virtual goods trading and creating real value and meaning for the Web3 ecosystem

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Build a decentralized, secure, and user-friendly Web3 virtual goods trading platform. Through innovative liquidity staking mechanisms and DAO governance, enable every participant to share in the platform's growth, truly achieving value co-creation and benefit sharing.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: Become the world's leading Web3 virtual goods trading ecosystem, connecting millions of users and creators, promoting the prosperity of the virtual economy, enabling digital assets to play greater value in the real world, and building a new era of digital economy that truly belongs to the community.

revenueSharing.title: 70% Revenue Sharing
revenueSharing.desc: World's first 70% platform fees distributed to staking users

security.title: Multi-layer Security
security.desc: Smart contract audits, KYC verification, fund escrow

governance.title: Community Governance
governance.desc: DAO governance, community decisions, transparent and open

ecosystem.title: Global Ecosystem
ecosystem.desc: Multi-chain support, multi-language service, global coverage

opportunity.title: Market Opportunity
items: • Rapid growth of Web3 gaming users
• Surging demand for digital asset trading
• Traditional platforms' high fee pain points

features.title: Platform Features
features.subtitle: Discover the powerful features that make Sapphire Mall the leading Web3 virtual goods trading platform

liquidityStaking.title: Liquidity Staking
liquidityStaking.desc: Earn 70% of platform fees through liquidity staking. Provide liquidity and get rewarded with SAP tokens.

daoGovernance.title: DAO Governance
daoGovernance.desc: Participate in platform governance with SAP tokens. Vote on proposals and shape the future of the platform.

globalMarketplace.title: Global Marketplace
globalMarketplace.desc: Trade virtual goods globally with multi-language support and diverse payment options.

secureTrading.title: Secure Trading
secureTrading.desc: Built on blockchain technology with smart contract automation and escrow services for secure transactions.

multiAsset.title: Massive Commodity Trading
multiAsset.desc: Support for gaming items, digital art, virtual land, music, fashion, and collectibles across multiple platforms.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.desc: Real-time market data, price analytics, and trading insights to help you make informed decisions.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Building the Future of Virtual Goods Trading, Empowering Web3 Ecosystem Development

team.title: Team Introduction
team.content: Sapphire Mall is built by an experienced Web3 team, with members from renowned technology companies and blockchain projects, possessing rich experience in decentralized finance, smart contract development, product design, and global operations. We are committed to solving the pain points of traditional virtual goods trading through technological innovation.

expertise.title: Technical Expertise
expertise.desc: Blockchain, Smart Contracts, Distributed Systems, Security Auditing

experience.title: Industry Experience
experience.desc: 5+ years of Web3 development experience, participated in multiple DeFi projects

vision.title: Global Vision
vision.desc: Diverse background team with deep understanding of global market needs

innovation.title: Innovation Driven
innovation.desc: Continuously exploring Web3 technology frontiers to provide users with the best trading experience

userFirst.title: User First
userFirst.desc: User-centric approach, creating simple and easy-to-use Web3 products

community.title: Community Co-creation
community.desc: Building and governing the platform together with community members to achieve value co-creation

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Ready to join the future of virtual goods trading? Our team is always here to support you

footer.tagline: The future of Web3 virtual goods trading
